path.style: vector-effect: none; fill: none; stroke: rgb(99, 110, 250); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2px; opacity: 1;

fill: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 0;
